title: Add 'Our Work' gallery section to landing page

requirements.summary: Create a new landing-page Our Work gallery section component and wire it into LandingPage between ServicesSection and CoverageSection.
acceptanceCriteria: A new React component exists under the existing landing components folder (frontend/src/components/landing/...) for the gallery section.
LandingPage includes the new gallery section after ServicesSection and before CoverageSection.
No changes are made to files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutable paths.

file_operations.description: Create a new landing section component that will render the Our Work gallery content (static, frontend-only).
Import and render OurWorkSection after ServicesSection and before CoverageSection to match the required landing page flow.

requirements.summary: Implement the Our Work gallery UI with English heading/subtitle and responsive image card grid with hover animations.
acceptanceCriteria: The section displays a heading "Our Work" and a subtitle "Professional indoor and outdoor AC cleaning" (or equivalent English phrasing).
The gallery grid is responsive with breakpoints equivalent to grid-cols-1 / sm:grid-cols-2 / lg:grid-cols-3.
Each card includes an image, an English title, and (if included) a short English caption; images have meaningful alt text.
Hovering a card increases its shadow and slightly scales the image (no layout shift).

file_operations.description: Implement section heading/subtitle and a responsive Tailwind grid of image cards with rounded corners, subtle border/shadow, overflow-hidden image container, and hover interactions (card shadow increase + image scale) without layout shift.

requirements.summary: Seed the Our Work gallery with at least three static items including the provided Unsplash URL and consistent image cropping.
acceptanceCriteria: At least 3 gallery items render by default.
One item uses the exact provided image URL.
All images display with consistent dimensions/cropping (e.g., same height and object-cover).

file_operations.description: Add a static in-component data list with at least 3 gallery items, ensuring one uses the exact Unsplash URL (https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1621905235850-66c430939502?auto=format&fit=crop&w=600&h=400&q=80), and render images with consistent fixed height and object-cover cropping.
